channel.title: Tutorial on JobRunr
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on JobRunr

item.title: JobRunr, Project Loom and Virtual Threads
item.description: After integrating the Virtual Threads of Project Loom, it’s time for a showdown between Java 11, Java 16 without Virtual Threads and Java 16 with Virtual Threads.

item.title: Testing JobRunr against 12 different JVM's
item.description: A hands-on tutorial on how JobRunr is tested against 12 different JVM’s using TestContainers.

item.title: JobRunr ♥ Kubernetes ♥ Terraform
item.description: Learn how to scale JobRunr to have a whopping 869% speed increase

item.title: Easily process long-running jobs with JobRunr
item.description: A tutorial on how to use JobRunr, Spring Data JPA and Docx-Stamper to generate the salary slips for all employees of Acme Corp
